#若要一次輸出兩個元素
```{r}
gpa_fun2 <- function(studentID){
  transcriptDataFinal$學號==studentID -> logiChosenStudent
  
  subSample <- transcriptDataFinal[logiChosenStudent,]
  
  sum(subSample$學期成績*subSample$學分數)/
    sum(subSample$學分數) -> GPA
  return(
    list(
      平均成績=GPA,
      成績單=subSample
      )
  )
}
```

```{r}
gpa_fun2("92aS67fee") -> outputValue
outputValue$平均成績
outputValue$成績單
```
#練習
```{r}
demand_supply_fun <- function(P,a,b,c,d) {
  Qs=a+b*P
  Qd=c-d*P
  Es=Qs-Qd
  return(
    list(供給量=Qs,
            需求量=Qd,
            超額供給=Es,
            )
  )
}
```



#條件執行
```{r}
a <- readline(prompt = "請輸入一個數字： ")
if(a < 0) {
  print("a為負值")
}
```

```{r}
supply_fun2 <- function(P,a,b){
  Qs <- a+b*P
  if(P>=0) {
    return(Qs)
  }
}
supply_fun2(P=-1,0,1)
supply_fun2(P=2,0,1)
```

```{r}
a <-  readline(prompt = "請輸入一個數字： ")
if(a < 0) {
  print("a為負值")
} else {
  print("a不為負值")
}
```


```{r}
supply_fun3 <- function(P,a,b){
  Qs <- a+b*P
  if(P < 0) {
    message("P cannot be negative") # 在螢幕出現的「錯誤」提示，沒有輸出任何值
  } else {
    return(Qs)
  }
}
supply_fun3(P=-1,0,1)
supply_fun3(P=2,0,1)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
transcriptDataFinal <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/transcriptDataFinal.csv")
gpa_fun <- function(studentID){
  if(studentID %in% transcriptDataFinal$學號){
   transcriptDataFinal$學號==studentID -> logiChosenStudent
  
  subSample <- transcriptDataFinal[logiChosenStudent,]
  
  sum(subSample$學期成績*subSample$學分數)/
    sum(subSample$學分數) -> GPA
  return(GPA)
  }else{
    message("查無此學號") 
  }
    
}
```
